data: For hypokalemia, hypomagnesemia, or hypophosphatemia and creatinine less than 150 umol/l and urine output greater than 0.5ml/kg/h for 2 consecutive hours, follow electrolyte replacement protocol, otherwise call most responsible provider
20 mmol, IV, q30min, PRN hypokalemia, administer over: 30 minute, drug form: bag
10 mmol, IV, q30min, PRN hypokalemia, administer over: 30 minute, drug form: bag
40 mmol, NG-tube, TID, PRN hypokalemia, drug form: oral liq
40 mmol, PO, TID, PRN hypokalemia, drug form: tablet
15 mmol, IV, q4h interval, PRN hypophosphatemia, administer over: 2 hour
5 g, IV, as directed, PRN hypomagnesemia, administer over: 3 hour
